title: Best assist of this World Cup so far.

author: Closerthanyouthink-1
text: After this group stage, and seeing Ronaldo play who thinks Ten Hag was wrong when he benched him?

author: [deleted]
text:
well if you think from another perspective

all man u players are playing way better than under ten hag right now

so isn't ten hag the problem?

author: Closerthanyouthink-1
text: No sure I follow. Let me ask my question differently would Portugal results be any different without Ronaldo?

author: Closerthanyouthink-1
text: Let me answer my own question, since it is downvoted. Portugal is better without “washed”Ronaldo, evidence today’s game. So is Manchester United.
